1.1.name: wordpress/nometa
1.1.description:
NoMeta is a new plugin I wrote. I wrote this plugin after getting to frame #45/tip #25 at this Yoast.com Presentation. Basicly this plugin is those 3 lines of code :). I thought Ill make life easier for people, so they dont need to retype those lines and try to insert them into WordPress in some way.

Yomtov

You should follow me on twitter
